expo.name: Akale Oru Istham
expo.description: A social discovery platform for lonely inanimate objects

infoPlist.NSCameraUsageDescription: This app needs access to camera to capture photos of objects for profile creation.
infoPlist.NSLocationWhenInUseUsageDescription: This app needs access to location to find objects near your campus location.
infoPlist.NSPhotoLibraryUsageDescription: This app needs access to photo library to select images for object profiles.

plugins.photosPermission: The app accesses your photos to let you select images for object profiles.
